    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Bones](/Feats.aspx?ID=1404) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 42 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You are struck by a critical hit that deals physical damage.

</column>

---

Your intractable nature can help you shrug off even the most grievous injuries. Attempt a DC 17 flat check. If you are successful, the attack becomes a normal hit.
name: Stone Bones
